hero.title: Welcome to NavCare
hero.subtitle: Connecting patients and healthcare providers worldwide with secure booking, messaging, and payments.

about_us.title: About NavCare
about_us.body: NavCare is a web and mobile platform built to connect patients with healthcare providers across the globe. With appointment booking, integrated messaging, and secure payment options, it offers a simple and safe way to access medical services. More than a platform, it is a vision for streamlined international care that will evolve into a multi-service hub with digital health solutions, personalized support, and smooth experiences at every step.

story.title: Our Story
story.body: Founded in 2024, NavMarket was created to overcome the gaps we saw in existing marketplaces. We set out to build a space that is secure, efficient, and rich in features that elevate every userâ€™s experience.

priorities.title: Our Priorities
priorities.body: Quality, reliability, and security guide how we design and deliver every solution.

quality.title: Quality
quality.body: Quality is a standard built into every service. We deliver top-tier products through rigorous controls at each stage, ensuring reliability, efficiency, and a perfect fit for our clientsâ€™ needs.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.body: Reliability is at the heart of our work. We craft robust, stable, and high-performing products that meet expectations over time through disciplined processes and continuous monitoring.

security.title: Security
security.body: Security is a top priority. We safeguard data and financial transactions with advanced protocols, constantly updating our defenses so clients operate with confidence and peace of mind.

company.title: Our Company
company.body: KIG (Koudri Innovations Group) is a dynamic, innovative extension of our organization, already specialized across three domains. As a new subsidiary, we stay close to trends and technological advances, blending established expertise with an agile, customer-centric mindset to deliver cutting-edge software, technology, and digital experiences. Our dedication to innovation and excellence positions us to tackle tomorrow's challenges while creating lasting value for clients and partners.

offerings.title: What We Offer
offerings.body: A platform designed to host and highlight the services people look for every day.

diverse_listings.title: Diverse Listings
diverse_listings.body: From real estate to cars, services, and daily essentials, we gather a wide range of listings to meet every need.

user_experience.title: User-Friendly Experience
user_experience.body: An intuitive design and easy-to-use interface make buying and selling straightforward and stress-free.

subscriptions.title: Subscription Plans
subscriptions.body: Flexible subscription plans unlock extra benefits and promotional opportunities.

values.title: Our Values
values.body: Community, customer focus, and innovation shape how we build NavCare.

community.title: Community
community.body: Beyond transactions, our marketplace fosters a vibrant community where support and growth come together.

customer_first.title: Customer First
customer_first.body: Users sit at the center of every decision, ensuring their needs and satisfaction always come first.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.body: We continuously improve to deliver modern features that keep the experience fresh and forward-looking.

cta.title: Building the future of connected care
cta.body: As NavCare grows into a multi-service hub, we remain committed to secure consultations, personalized support, and seamless experiences for every user.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.heading: Let's talk
contact.subtitle: Questions, comments, or suggestions? Simply fill in the form and we'll be in touch shortly.
contact.submit_placeholder: Message sending will be configured later.

feedback.auth_required: Please sign in to send feedback.
feedback.comment_required: Please add a note before sending your feedback.
feedback.hint: Share your thoughts or issues here

faq.title: Help & FAQs
faq.subtitle: Quick answers about booking, accounts, and getting the best out of Nav Care.
faq.questions.about_app.question: What is Nav Care and how can it help me?
faq.questions.about_app.answer: Nav Care lets you explore hospitals, doctors, and service offerings, see details like prices and locations, and manage all your appointments from one place.
faq.questions.account_needed.question: Do I need an account to use the app?
faq.questions.account_needed.answer: You can browse freely, but signing in is required to book, reschedule, or cancel appointments and to sync your profile details across devices.
faq.questions.book_appointment.question: How do I book an appointment?
faq.questions.book_appointment.answer: Open any service offering from Home or Search, tap "Make an appointment", pick the start and end time that suits you, then confirm. If you are not signed in yet, the app will ask you to log in first.
faq.questions.manage_appointment.questio: How do I edit, reschedule, or cancel a booking?
faq.questions.manage_appointment.answer: Go to the Appointments tab, select the appointment card, then adjust the start/end time or change its status to cancelled. The list refreshes automatically when the update succeeds.
faq.questions.search_services.question: What is the best way to find the right doctor or service?
faq.questions.search_services.answer: Use the Search tab to type a doctor, hospital, or service name. Apply the available filters (location, rating, price, or language when provided) to narrow results, then open a result to view details and book.
faq.questions.profile_updates.question: Where can I update my profile or phone number?
faq.questions.profile_updates.answer: Open the Profile tab and tap "Edit profile" to change your name, phone, address, or profile photo. Swipe down to refresh if you need to pull the latest data after saving.
faq.questions.language_switch.question: Can I switch the app language?
faq.questions.language_switch.answer: Yes. Open the side drawer, choose Arabic, English, or French from the language selector, and the interface updates instantly without restarting the app.
faq.questions.password_reset.question: I forgot my password. How do I reset it?
faq.questions.password_reset.answer: Use the "Forgot password" option on the sign-in screen to request a reset. Follow the on-screen steps to set a new password with your email or phone number.
faq.questions.data_sync.question: The app is not loading data. What should I try?
faq.questions.data_sync.answer: Check your internet connection, then pull to refresh on Home, Search, or Appointments. If the issue persists, sign out and back in to refresh your session before trying again.

network_error.title: No internet connection
network_error.subtitle: Check your Wi-Fi or mobile data, then try again.

server_error.title: Server unreachable
server_error.subtitle: We could not reach our servers. Please retry.
